javadoc: Manages the open/close state of structures and arrays at specific addresses.

methods.javadoc:
Marks the given data as open.  This method notifies listeners of changes.
@param data The data to open.
methods.name: openData
methods.comment: Marks the given data as open.  This method notifies listeners of changes.

methods.javadoc:
Marks the given data as open.  This method notifies listeners of changes.
@param data The data to open.
methods.name: closeData
methods.comment: Marks the given data as open.  This method notifies listeners of changes.

methods.javadoc:
Tests if the data at the given address is open
@param address the address to test if open
methods.name: isOpen
methods.comment: Tests if the data at the given address is open

params.name: address
params.comment: the address to test if open

methods.name: isOpen
methods.comment: Test is the data at the given address and component path is open

methods.name: getOpenIndex
methods.comment: Returns the index of the component that is open at the given address.

params.name: address
params.comment: the address to find the open index.

methods.javadoc:
Adds a change listener to be notified when a location is open or closed.
@param l the listener to be notified.
methods.name: addChangeListener
methods.comment: Adds a change listener to be notified when a location is open or closed.

methods.javadoc:
Removes the listener.
@param l the listener to remove.
methods.name: removeChangeListener

name: OpenCloseManager
comment: Manages the open/close state of structures and arrays at specific addresses.
